name: The Terminator
overview: THE BATTLE TO SAVE THE FUTURE HAS BEGUN You are Kyle Reese. Your mission: go back in time to protect Sarah Conner, mother of John Conner, leader of the resistance of the future. The enemy: Cyberdyne Systems model 101 - The Terminator. Outside, living human tissue; inside, a hyper-alloy combat chassis, fully armored. It can't be reasoned with. It won't be bargained with. It doesn't feel pity or remorse. And it absolutely will not stop-ever-until you are destroyed! The Terminator brings home all the excitement, tension and non-stop action of the smash hit movie:
